name: Remember Me?
description:
Welcome to the abandoned amusement park

Control your character using the Arrow Button or Left Click and Space Bar to interact with items.

You dreamt of this place when you were young, but now you're here, and it's not what you remember. You invited your friend to come along, but they were dragged away, leaving you alone to face the horrors that await. You must find your friend before it's too late, but be warned, the park is not as abandoned as it seems. Something from the past is lurking in the shadows, waiting to haunt you at every turn. The air is thick with the stench of death, and the only sounds you hear are your own footsteps and the beating of your own heart. Will you be able to overcome the darkness that surrounds you, or will you become just another victim of the haunted amusement park?

This game was created during the Young Game Dev Camt 2019, which was held from November 22-24, 2019. It is noteworthy that this game was developed within a mere 14 hours. This hard work paid off when the game was awarded 2nd runner-up, The following individuals are responsible for the game's success:

Game Designer: Flora Sprig (Supitcha Chailom)

Game Programmer: Flora Sprig (Supitcha Chailom)

Game Artist (UI&Environment): Chomountain

Game Artist (Cutscene&Character): Pavloaf
